title: Shadow Matriarchy & Euphemism - Pt III U-fem-ism
description:
Bagged another PVK Q&A Shoutout in which he teased a response, so here's a rush release of part III. Euphemized Liberty is Liberty's Inversion. Be careful with your words.

PVK Q&A Shoutout:  /watch?v=u0QHXKJqLUE
PVK High Masculine Status:  /watch?v=rWAEq7TInO0
Liberty Torches:  /watch?v=SRjbXiwNVDc
Already Preggers Pill:  /watch?v=cv4owOey8Hw
Of Mice & Mankind:  /watch?v=UWZNpLR82OA

Pt I:  /watch?v=/qFzA6_78pAg
Pt II:  /watch?v=cPSThiEIFAs

Here's a Discord for people who don't hate me:
https://discord.gg/W8tnFw5t9p

Here's a Patreon for people who want to encourage me:
https://www.patreon.com/grimgriz
